flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
you can make this project your self you need the following things:

1 a ply wood

212v batteries

1 50-60 cc motor

1 rc circut and trinsmeter which is very easy to make

1 10" cycle ture

a big freewheel

a small freewheel

1 chain for the freewheel gears

step 1

cut the tow inch ply for your convenence

step 2

guide.summary:
This bike can only go straight and backwards
it uses 24v and you can sit on it and drive it y.you can also make it R/C controle
